item.title: GoLab 2018: Wrap Up
item.author: fgualazzi@gmail.com (Francesco Gualazzi)
item.description: I’m in the train back from GoLab 2018 and I am so happy that I attended this conference! It’s been definitely one of most beautiful con I have attended in Italy, with tremendous speakers from all over the globe like Filippo Valsorda, Eleanor McHugh, Ron Evans and Bill Kennedy among many others; I have to say the organizers were just perfect in everything from the venue setup to the workshop organization, as if the quality of the talks ware not enough.
